**Advance Contract Award Notice**

**DASbox Mini Bioreactor System Contract**

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) publishes this notice to inform interested suppliers that a contract is intended to be awarded to a pre-identified supplier for the delivery of a DASbox Mini Bioreactor System. Suppliers who consider themselves qualified and capable of meeting the requirements are invited to submit a Statement of Capabilities.

**Contract Notice Details:**

* Contract Title: DASbox Mini Bioreactor System
* Contract Number: 23-58036
* Solicitation Number: 23-58036
* Amendment Number: 7
* Publication Date: September 27, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 19, 2023 at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: October 31, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 28, 2025

**Contract Description:**

The NRC is seeking a DASbox Mini Bioreactor System to expand existing fermentation capabilities in its Charlottetown facility. The system must be compatible with the DASware Software Suite and capable of supporting both mammalian cell culture and microbial fermentation processes. The requirements include:

* Support for up to 8 cultures to run in parallel or individually, with working volumes between 60 to 250 mL
* User-configurable to expand with additional controllers and/or vessels up to 24 bioreactors in parallel setup
* Compatibility with the DASware Software Suite
* Digital sensor capabilities for each reaction vessel, including temperature, pH, nutrient content, DO control, foam control/level, and optical sensors

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCoFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPAFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
